name: Escape If You Can 4
description:
Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

Detective Ale was wanted by the police after framed. But he can not be caught by the police before finding the real criminal.
Hiding in a town for a period of time. Detective Ale exposed his whereabouts yet. Now the police have blocked off the neighborhood. Can Detective Ale escape from here?


Magnificent puzzles,Stunning story
Beautifully rendered backgrounds that will pull you in and never let you go!
Beautiful soundtrack perfectly suited to this eerie and haunting world.
Auto-save feature , never lose your progress again.
